Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (3/25/2022)
-----------------
- Initial Release

0.0.2 (3/25/2022)
-----------------
- Updated file imports

0.0.3 (3/26/2022)
-----------------
- Updated file imports and fixed gnome call bug
- Note: Does not work for windows environments yet
- to run a basic demo, use:
    from trinity4bci import master
    master.RUN()
